title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1021.2 - Council members as volunteers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1021.2 - Council members as volunteers

State Regulations

Members of the Indigent Criminal

Appeals Councils, as volunteers, are expressly authorized to participate in a

State-sponsored volunteer program within the meaning of subdivision 1 of
section
17
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1021.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
